title: A New Novel By Harper Lee Stirs Controversy
teaser: Harper Lee's "To Kill a Mockingbird" was published 55 years ago, winning a Pulitzer and wide acclaim. Now, a newly discovered manuscript by the 88-year-old author will be published in July. We explore the excitement and controversy over the new Harper Lee novel.
